EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Minn_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering! Please see your event details below.
Date: Tuesday, 18 July 2017
Time: 8:00am - 5:15pm
Location: COCO 1010 W. Lake Street, Suite 100 Minneapolis, Minnesota 55408 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1010+W+Lake+St+%23100,+Minneapolis,+MN+55408/@44.9488512,-93.2948744,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x87f62786bbfa789d:0xd0d91cd1c870dd99!8m2!3d44.9488474!4d-93.2926857]]>)
Agenda: Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/minneapolis?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
***The information below is only for the Data Science Workshop attendees (afternoon session) Workshop Prerequisites:
- Willingness to participate in a demanding, high-intensity training experience - Comfort with data analytic technologies preferred (statistics, mathematics, machine learning, SQL, R, Python)
Workshop Audience:
- Experienced data analysts and data engineers willing to work hard to achieve superior Data Science skills - Anyone else who wants to learn about Data Science using Pivotal software
Laptop Requirements:
- The workshop is a hands-on lab and requires attendees to provide their own laptop - The workshop will be using a cloud cluster. Windows students will need an SSH program installed such as MobaXterm (recommended). MacOS students will need a terminal program such as iTerm (recommended).
If you have any questions, please contact Patrick Gillis at pgillis@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pgillis@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
